Title: Requires social services districts to distribute educational materials pertaining to sexual health to individuals enrolled in Medicaid
Summary: Requires social services districts to distribute educational materials pertaining to sexual health, including information on HIV prevention and pre-exposure prophylaxis to individuals enrolled in Medicaid.
LawCode: Add ยง367-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring social services districts to distribute educational materials pertaining to sexual health to individuals enrolled in Medicaid
